original_title: Litro Gas prices to drop below Rs. 3000
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The price of 12.5 kg domestic LP gas cylinders will be priced between Rs. 2000 – Rs. 3000.
This was confirmed by the Chairman of state-run Litro Gas Muditha Peiris.
The official announcement of the price revision will be made on Tuesday (04).
